# [manner](manner.html)
Latin suffix -menta in collective nouns like armenta â€œherd, flockâ€. Latin -menta is from Proto-Indo-European *-mnÌ¥tehâ‚‚ (*-mnÌ¥ + *-tehâ‚‚).[1]  

instrument, medium, or result of; e.g. monumentum
